stepAnswer: click the filter button in the cell, then check all boxes to include all filters. drag "Service Type" out of the filtered area
stepTitle: How do you remove a report filter from a PivotTable report?
choices: click the filter button in the cell, then check all boxes to include all filters. drag "Service Type" out of the filtered area
click the filter button in the cell, then check all boxes to include all filters. drag "Service Type" out to the corner of the screen
the service filter goes away on its own once you reboot the application
